title: Furnished 1 Bedroom apartment with Bay View
posting_body: ['The apartment has a large balcony, and views of Alcatraz and the Bay!', 'Rent-controlled building with onsite management and maintenance plus onsite laundry and heated outdoor pool.', 'Copy & Paste the link to view 3D tour of floorplan (Not of Exact Unit): <URL>', 'Reasons You’ll Love Living at Crystal Tower:', 'Luxurious 1 and 2 bedroom apartments available with upgraded finishes', 'Located between Lombard Street and Greenwich Street', 'Spectacular views of the Golden Gate Bridge and the San Francisco Bay', 'Chinatown and North Beach’s famous dining options nearby', 'Moments from Ghirardelli Square, Fisherman’s Wharf, Pier 39, and the Financial District', 'Community amenities include a heated swimming pool for residents', 'Furnished and unfurnished apartments are available', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', 'Furnished Apartments', 'Professional Onsite Management', 'Flexible Lease Terms Available', 'Electricity Included', 'Heated Swimming Pool', 'Controlled Access', 'Laundry Facilities', 'Housekeeping Services Available', 'Parking Available', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', 'Modern Furnishings', 'Flat Screen TV / DVD Player', 'Golden Gate Bridge Views', 'Light, Open Floor Plans', 'Private Balconies', 'No pets allowed', 'NEIGHBORHOOD', 'Washington Square Park (0.3 miles)', 'Nearby Muni lines: 30, 91, 8, 39', 'Cafes on Columbus Ave (across the street)', 'Coit Tower (0.6 miles)', 'North Beach Library (0.1 miles)', 'Cable Car stop across the street', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'today to reserve this apartment or to schedule a virtual tour or a self-guided tour.', '*photos may not be of the exact unit*', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
